text: Iceland Express was a low-cost airline from Iceland. It began in 2002. Reykjavík-Keflavík Airport used to be their main hub. WOW Air bought the airline in 2012. ==References== Category:2002 establishments in Europe Category:2012 disestablishments in Europe Category:Airlines of Europe Category:Transport in Iceland Category:21st-century establishments in Iceland Category:Organizations based in Iceland
title: Iceland Express
